articles.author: Sebastian Kettley
articles.title: NASA's last-ditch defence against 'asteroid threat' may one day prevent 'global disaster' - Daily Express
articles.description: THE THREAT posed by rogue asteroids is very much 'real' and NASA's ambitious Double Asteroid Redirection Test (DART) may one day prove to be Earth's last line of defence from 'global disaster', a renowned astronomer has told Express.co.uk.
